thread.title: Humm Kombucha Kicks Off Partnership with Seattle Seahawks
thread.title_full: Humm Kombucha Kicks Off Partnership with Seattle Seahawks - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Humm Kombucha Kicks Off Partnership with Seattle Seahawks
text:
Humm Kombucha
RENTON, Wash. , Oct. 20, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- The Seattle Seahawks and Humm Kombucha announced today a partnership that makes Humm the Official Kombucha of the Seattle Seahawks. The partnership gives Seahawks fans the opportunity to try Humm's kombucha at CenturyLink Field and gives Humm a chance to reach a broader audience.
The Seahawks are promoting the new partnership with sample tastings around CenturyLink Field. Humm's Pomegranate Lemonade and Coconut Lime are currently available on tap at the stadium, and all nine flavors of Humm are stocked in the Seahawks' new Grab and Go Market , which offers fans healthy alternatives such as house-made salads, vegetarian fare and gluten-free options.
"We couldn't be more excited for the opportunity to work with the Seahawks," said Humm co-founder Jamie Danek . "Fans' will be happy to see another option for a healthy, low-sugar beverage. And we get to work with one of the most successful, forward-thinking and community-oriented teams in the league. It's a huge win for us."
"We are proud to feature Northwest brands at CenturyLink Field," said Amy Sprangers , Seahawks Vice President of Corporate Partnerships. "Humm is a great local company and their kombucha will provide an additional beverage option for our fans."
Kombucha is a fermented tea low in sugar and calories, making it a great choice for people who want something both delicious and healthy. Humm Kombucha adds another Pacific NW favorite to CenturyLink Field.
About Humm Kombucha
Founded by Jamie Danek and Michelle Mitchell in 2009 as Kombucha Mama, Humm Kombucha rebranded in 2014 in anticipation of rapid growth. From the company's early days brewing in the founders' kitchen through its movement to a full-scale brewery, Humm Kombucha remains focused on accessibility. Humm can be found in grocery stores, convenience stores, and restaurants, in bottles and on tap, throughout the Pacific Northwest and the western U.S.
About Kombucha
Kombucha is an effervescent drink created by fermenting tea with a symbiotic colony of bacteria and yeast, or "SCOBY." Kombucha is nature's perfect energy source -- all natural, all organic, all good for you. Drinkers of the tea report a natural energy boost and a strengthened immune system. Kombucha contains B-vitamins, as well as probiotics. Humm's taste is beloved by kombucha drinkers and converts many people who have tried kombucha but dislike the stronger, more traditional taste of many brands.
Retail locations at www.hummkombucha.com . Join the conversation at facebook.com/hummkombucha, instagram.com/hummkombucha and twitter.com/hummkombucha.
